questions.label: 1. Please review the Business Support of this Application

2. In order to consider the Business Risk - (The exposure a company or organization has to factor(s) that will lower its profits or lead it to fail), please rate the following business risk factors for the Application at hand:

options.label: If the application goes down, it creates threat to human life
This application is subject to any compliance audits (e.g PCI, HIPAA etc)?
The application is designed to aid Top Management or Board Members in decision making? (E.g. CEO, CIO, CTO, CISO, CFO, Board of Directors etc)

questions.label: 3.1. Please review the Data Objects which are processed by this Application
3.2. The data objects which are processed by this application have an average confidentiality rating of...
4. Please rate the following information risk factors:

children.label: 4.1. Availability of Data (Ensuring timely and reliable access to and use of information): The disruption of access to or use of information or an information system could be expected to have the following adverse effect on organizational operations, organizational assets, or individuals.

4.2. Integrity of Data (Guarding against improper information modification or destruction, and includes ensuring information non-repudiation and authenticity): The unauthorized modification or destruction of information could be expected to have the following adverse effect on organizational operations, organizational assets, or individuals

questions.label: 5.1. Please classify the technical fitness of this Application
5.2. Please rate the following technical risk factors:

options.label: Concurrent Users impact the performance of this application drastically
Server Response Time results in severe performance issues
Render Response Time impacts the usability of the application
A security evaluation has been performed for the software
Security requirements have been established for the software
Each software review, or audit, includes an evaluation of the security requirements
A configuration management and corrective action process is in place
Physical security for the software is adequate
